verbose_text: Piroctone olamine alone or in combination with other agents has been demonstrated to reduce erythema, scaling, burning / stinging sensation, and pruritus in patients with FSD, with excellent cosmetic results [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: olamine alone or in combination with other agents has been demonstrated to reduce erythema, scaling, burning/stinging sensation, and pruritus in patients with FSD
